column10: drivers have a green light NB on leesburg pike, and those turning right go through an active crosswalk. two pregnant pedestrians had to run across the intersection despite having the Walk signal to avoid turning cars w/ a green light
3 separate drivers turned right on red while pedestrian with walk signal attempted to cross
driver did right on red while looking left (for oncoming traffic) the entire time. she did not slow down or stop and blew through the active cross walk, forcing pedestrian to jump back out of her way

cars get a green light on Leesburg Pike at same time as pedestrians get walk signal to cross arlington blvd and wilson blvd. this leads to drivers turning right onto Wilson Blvd while pedestrian tried to cross. collision narrowly avoided
